Once in a cozy corner of a bustling garden, lived a little spider named Webby. Unlike his daring siblings who spun webs high in the trees, Webby feared heights. He would gaze longingly at the shimmering webs above, feeling the thrill but never daring to climb. One day, a fierce storm struck, and the winds threatened to sweep his family away. In a moment of bravery, Webby climbed higher than he ever had, weaving a sturdy web to catch his siblings. They clung to him, safe from the storm. From that day on, Webby learned that sometimes, facing fears leads to the greatest adventures.
